title: Chris Gayle
summary: Chris Gayle, is a Jamaican cricketer who plays international cricket for the West Indies.

value.label: Christopher Henry Gayle
Invalid Date (age 39)
Kingston, Jamaica
Gayle Storm
Jamaican
All-rounder
Left-handed batsman and right arm off-break bowler

image.altText: Style of play for Chris Gayle
image.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.0 Generic license.

value.label: Gayle made his first-class debut in 1998, at age 19 for Jamaica.
Gayle played his first One Day International against India in 1999

The India national cricket team is also known as Team India and Men in Blue. India is ranked first in Tests, second in ODIs and second in T20Is by the ICC. Virat Kohli is the current captain of the team, while the head coach is Ravi Shastri.

value.label: Gayle was part of the West Indies team in the 2003 world cup
Gayle could not play the inaugural version of the IPL due to an injury
The Kolkata Knight Riders (also known by the acronym KKR) are a franchise cricket team representing the city of Kolkata in the Indian Premier League.

value.label: Gayle is the first batsman to score a century in each of the three formats of the game.

image.altText: Gayle is the first batsman to score a century in each of the three formats of the game.

value.label: Gayle is the first batsman to score a triple century in Test cricket, double century in ODI cricket and a century in T20

image.altText: Gayle is the first batsman to score a triple century in Test cricket, double century in ODI cricket and a century in T20

value.label: Gayle is the first batsman to score a T20 international century

image.altText: Gayle is the first batsman to score a T20 international century

value.label: Gayle hit the fastest ever ODI double century, against Zimbabwe, off 138 balls

image.altText: Gayle hit the fastest ever ODI double century, against Zimbabwe, off 138 balls

value.label: Gayle is first batsman in the world to cross 10,000 runs in T20 cricket

image.altText: Gayle is first batsman in the world to cross 10,000 runs in T20 cricket

value.label: The West Indies cricket team, traditionally known as the Windies, is a multi-national cricket team representing the Anglophone Caribbean region and administered by Cricket West Indies. The players on this composite team are selected from a chain of fifteen Caribbean territories
